name: Eug√®ne Ionesco
description: Romanian-French playwright who was a leading figure in the Theatre of the Absurd. His plays like 'The Bald Soprano' and 'Rhinoceros' explored the absurdity of human existence and communication.
philosophy: We have not succeeded in answering all our problems. The answers we have found only serve to raise a whole set of new questions. In some ways we feel we are as confused as ever, but we think we are confused on a higher level and about more important things.
